medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Developed approximately 12 hours prior to presentation, followed by nausea and nonbilious emesis. The pain has gradually migrated towards the right lower quadrant over the past few hours, is constant, sharp, and has not been experienced before.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Thyroidectomy for malignant nodule, Insomnia, Bipolar Disorder
